DIMENSIONS

All pieces are made to order, frame to fabric so the dimensions may be determined by the customer.

FABRIC

All fabrics are supplied by the customer. Yardage requirements are supplied in estimates once the design is specified.

data.85:
[et_pb_section fb_built="1" theme_builder_area="post_content" _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" background_color="#232949" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0"][et_pb_row _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" column_structure="1_2,1_2"][et_pb_column _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" type="1_2" theme_builder_area="post_content"][et_pb_text _builder_version="4.17.4" _module_preset="default" theme_builder_area="post_content" hover_enabled="0" sticky_enabled="0" text_text_color="#e1d8c2" text_font="Baskervville||||||||" text_font_size="22px" text_line_height="1.5em"]

Luther Quintana started his eponymous firm in 1987 and since then has become the premier purveyor of fine furniture and curtains to the design trade. His “get it done” attitude and unpretentious approach has garnered approval from some of the most respected designers and tastemakers in New York. His attention to detail is unrivaled. More importantly, his fervor for finishing each project well and on-time are the cornerstones of his firm.
